title: 01/13/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/13/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio about when the league could move to an 18 game schedule, and the reasons they'd do that. Award-Winning Journalist Andrea Kremer calls in for Fritzy's impression of her. And NFL Insider Jay Glazer discusses his new book "Unbreakable: How I Turned My Depression and Anxiety Into Motivation and You Can Too" and his battle with depression throughout the years.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
